languages.text: Человечество осваивало Простор, и Даргонус стал столицей отважных исследователей и покорителей звезд. Отсюда уходили в неизведанное дерзкие экспедиции к чужим системам, сюда возвращались они с диковинными трофеями. Капитаны, картографы и книгочеи стекались сюда, чтобы обменяться новостями.

Humanity was exploring the Expanse, and Dargonus became the capital for the brave starfarers and pioneers. It was from here that expeditions departed into the uncharted wilderness and here they returned bearing wondrous trophies. Captains, cartographers, and scribes flocked here to exchange news.
languages.original_text: Человечество осваивало Простор, и Даргонус стал столицей отважных исследователей и покорителей звезд. Отсюда уходили в неизведанное дерзкие экспедиции к чужим системам, сюда возвращались они с диковинными трофеями. Капитаны, картографы и книгочеи стекались сюда, чтобы обменяться новостями.

traits.locale_text: Mankind was exploring the Expanse, and Dargonus became the capital for the brave starfarers and pioneers. It was from here that expeditions departed into uncharted wilderness, and it is here where they returned bearing wondrous trophies. Captains, cartographers, and scribes flocked here to exchange news.

Mankind was exploring the Expanse, and Dargonus became the capital for the brave starfarers and pioneers. It was from here that expeditions departed into uncharted wilderness, and it is here where they returned bearing wondrous trophies. Captains, cartographers, and scribes flocked here to exchange news.

Humanity was exploring the Expanse, and Dargonus became the capital for the brave starfarers and pioneers. It was from here that expeditions departed into the uncharted wilderness and here they returned bearing wondrous trophies. Captains, cartographers, and scribes flocked here to exchange news.

Humanity was exploring the Expanse, and Dargonus became the capital for the brave starfarers and pioneers. It was from here that expeditions departed into the uncharted wilderness and here they returned bearing wondrous trophies. Captains, cartographers, and scribes flocked here to exchange news.

Humanity was exploring the Expanse, and Dargonus became the capital for the brave starfarers and pioneers. It was from here that expeditions departed into the uncharted wilderness and here they returned bearing wondrous trophies. Captains, cartographers, and scribes flocked here to exchange news.

languages.text: 人类开始探索浩瀚的科罗努斯扩区，而达戈努斯也成为了勇敢的星际旅行者与拓荒者的首都。无数探险队从这里出发，进入未知的星域，带着奇妙的战利品返航。不计其数的舰长、制图师与抄写员都聚集在这座城市里，互相交换情报。
languages.original_text: Humanity was exploring the Expanse, and Dargonus became the capital for the brave starfarers and pioneers. It was from here that expeditions departed into the uncharted wilderness and here they returned bearing wondrous trophies. Captains, cartographers, and scribes flocked here to exchange news.

traits.locale_text: 人类开始探索浩瀚的科罗努斯扩区，而达戈努斯也成为了勇敢的星际旅行者与拓荒者的首都。无数探险队从这里出发，进入未知的星域，带着奇妙的战利品返航。不计其数的舰长、制图师与抄写员都聚集在这座城市里，互相交换情报。

languages.text: 人類はエクスパンスを探索し、ダルゴナスは勇敢な宇宙旅行者や開拓者の中心地となった。地図にない荒地へ調査団はここから出発した。そして彼らは驚くべき戦利品を持ってこの地へと帰還した。船長、地図製作者、そして書士が情報交換のためにここへと集まった。
languages.original_text: Humanity was exploring the Expanse, and Dargonus became the capital for the brave starfarers and pioneers. It was from here that expeditions departed into the uncharted wilderness and here they returned bearing wondrous trophies. Captains, cartographers, and scribes flocked here to exchange news.

traits.locale_text: 人類はエクスパンスを探索し、ダルゴナスは勇敢な宇宙旅行者や開拓者の中心地となった。地図にない荒地へ調査団はここから出発した。そして彼らは驚くべき戦利品を持ってこの地へと帰還した。船長、地図製作者、そして書士が情報交換のためにここへと集まった。

languages.text: L'humanité explorait les Étendues, et Dargonus devint la capitale des braves pionniers et voyageurs stellaires. Ce fut de là que partirent des expéditions vers les zones inexplorées et là qu'elles revinrent chargées de trophées merveilleux. Capitaines, cartographes et scribes affluèrent sur place pour échanger des nouvelles.
languages.original_text: Humanity was exploring the Expanse, and Dargonus became the capital for the brave starfarers and pioneers. It was from here that expeditions departed into the uncharted wilderness and here they returned bearing wondrous trophies. Captains, cartographers, and scribes flocked here to exchange news.

traits.locale_text: L'humanité explorait les Étendues, et Dargonus devint la capitale des braves pionniers et voyageurs stellaires. Ce fut de là que partirent des expéditions vers les zones inexplorées et là qu'elles revinrent chargées de trophées merveilleux. Capitaines, cartographes et scribes affluèrent sur place pour échanger des nouvelles.

languages.text: La Humanidad estaba explorando la Extensión, y Dargonus se convirtió en la capital de los pioneros y los navegantes más osados. Desde allí partían las expediciones hacia los territorios desconocidos y allí volvían con sus maravillosos trofeos. Capitanes, cartógrafos y escribas se reunían aquí para intercambiar novedades.
languages.original_text: Humanity was exploring the Expanse, and Dargonus became the capital for the brave starfarers and pioneers. It was from here that expeditions departed into the uncharted wilderness and here they returned bearing wondrous trophies. Captains, cartographers, and scribes flocked here to exchange news.

traits.locale_text: La Humanidad estaba explorando la Extensión, y Dargonus se convirtió en la capital de los pioneros y los navegantes más osados. Desde allí partían las expediciones hacia los territorios desconocidos y allí volvían con sus maravillosos trofeos. Capitanes, cartógrafos y escribas se reunían aquí para intercambiar novedades.

languages.text: Die Menschheit erkundete die Ausdehnung, und Dargonus wurde zur Hauptstadt tapferer Sternenfahrer und Pioniere. Von hier starteten Expeditionen in die unbekannte Wildnis, und hierher kehrten sie mit wundersamen Trophäen zurück. Captains, Kartografen und Schreiber trafen sich hier, um Neuigkeiten auszutauschen.
languages.original_text: Humanity was exploring the Expanse, and Dargonus became the capital for the brave starfarers and pioneers. It was from here that expeditions departed into the uncharted wilderness and here they returned bearing wondrous trophies. Captains, cartographers, and scribes flocked here to exchange news.

traits.locale_text: Die Menschheit erkundete die Ausdehnung, und Dargonus wurde zur Hauptstadt tapferer Sternenfahrer und Pioniere. Von hier starteten Expeditionen in die unbekannte Wildnis, und hierher kehrten sie mit wundersamen Trophäen zurück. Captains, Kartografen und Schreiber trafen sich hier, um Neuigkeiten auszutauschen.

languages.text: Dargonus, Enginlik'i keşfeden İnsanlığın cesur yıldız yolcularının ve öncülerin başkenti oldu. Haritalarda yer almayan diyarlara yelken açan keşif seferleri buradan demir alıyor, elde ettikleri muazzam ganimetlerle buraya dönüyorlardı. Kaptan, haritacı ve yazmanlar da burada toplaşıp birbirleriyle gelişmeleri paylaşıyordu.
languages.original_text: Humanity was exploring the Expanse, and Dargonus became the capital for the brave starfarers and pioneers. It was from here that expeditions departed into the uncharted wilderness and here they returned bearing wondrous trophies. Captains, cartographers, and scribes flocked here to exchange news.

traits.locale_text: İnsanlık, Enginlik'i keşfediyordu ve Dargonus, cesur yıldız yolcularının ve öncülerin başkenti hâline geldi. Haritalandırılmamış diyarlara yelken açan keşif seferleri buradan çıkıyor, elde ettikleri muazzam ganimetlerle buraya geri dönüyorlardı. Kaptanlar, kartograflar ve yazmanlar burada toplaşıp paylaşımlar yapıyordu.
